data.manual_boost_soc: Boost State of Charge (SoC) when in manual mode?
data.history_days: How many days of load history for automated calculations?
data.forecast_hour: When you want to request the new PV forecast?
data.min_battery_soc: What percentage of battery charge do you desire at the end of the day?

data_description.boost: Automaticly calculate grid boost, or manually set (eg snowly days).
data_description.manual_boost_soc: When in manual mode, the target SoC for off-peak charging.
data_description.history_days: Fewer days of load history allow for faster seasonal changes. 4 is suggested.
data_description.forecast_hour: When (in 24 hour time) should solcast.com be called for new forecast data. Suggest 11pm (23).
data_description.min_battery_soc: Automatic calculations will set off-peak charging levels to keep the battery at or above this level at the end of the day.
data_description.percentile: Worst-case forecasts will result in more off-peak charging. Best-case may result in more charging at other times.
